<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Cadastro de Filmes">3c11904a470e421025e7b4b4116d43d9</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Diretor</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var ga = new GlideAjax('x_1300284_raposa_0.Filme');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'searchFilme');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_filme', newValue.replace(/ /g, '+'));
    ga.getXML(callback);

    function callback(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
        var data = JSON.parse(answer);

		var diretor = data.Director;

		ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'criarDiretor') ;
		ga.addParam('sysparm_diretor', diretor);		
       
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-14 15:27:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>15b1746b47c2021025e7b4b4116d4318</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Diretor</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews" source="x_1300284_raposa_0">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_15b1746b47c2021025e7b4b4116d4318</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-14 15:41:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
